text: Abigail Goldman is an American journalist. She won a 2004 Pulitzer Prize for National Reporting and 2004 George Polk Award. She teaches at University of California, Los Angeles. She graduated from University of Wisconsin-Madison and Columbia University Graduate School of Journalism. She worked for the Los Angeles Times. == References == Category:American journalists Category:Pulitzer Prize winners Category:George Polk Award winners Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:University of Wisconsinâ€“Madison alumni
